description:
Put a layer of quilt-like warmth between you and Winter’s worst moods. Wamth is just one of the reasons to love the Down With It Parka, sustainability is another. Recycled polyester and recycled down warm your body and your heart. With its high insulated collar and hood, you don’t need to add a scarf, and there are plenty of pockets for thawing chilled fingers and keeping your phone out from the cold.

  • Wind-proof recycled polyester shell with PFC-free DWR to shed light rain
  • Recycled 600 fill-power duck and goose down is warm, light and compressible
  • Chevron baffles and princess seaming offer a contoured silhouette
  • Insulated, low-profile hood is removeable
  • Zippered hand pockets, plus an interior zippered pocket
  • 2-way zipper lets you open your coat from the bottom, meaning you only need to open your coat a little when you want to sit down
  • Snap-up slits on each side make it possible to run for your bus
name: Patagonia Down With It Parka - Women's

value: 600 fill-power recycled goose and duck down blend
